channel.title: Left 4 Dead
channel.description: If you like anything Valve has ever made, you'll love this game. I can't even start on how much fun it is. It's the perfect balance of scary and good wholesome fun. Imo, and mo is pretty damn good ;), this deserves game of the year. Just go get the demo and try it yourself. I spent so much time on the demo, and now even more on the game.

item.title: Left 4 Dead
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I’ve downloaded it and played it for about 15 minutes, it seems okay but not much of a story line. More of a run, kill, walk, kill, lights go out, kill, etc type of game. I’ll put it this way, I’m glad I didn’t buy it.

You need to play it on Versus mode, preferably with 3 people you know well on your team. That’s where it really shines.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I’ve downloaded it and played it for about 15 minutes, it seems okay but not much of a story line. More of a run, kill, walk, kill, lights go out, kill, etc type of game. I’ll put it this way, I’m glad I didn’t buy it.

That’s the point of the game, that’s what make it so great. What more do you need know than zombies are attacking, you have guns, there are no safe places, only safer, etc.
Mopar, get some friends to get it too then play the game, you’ll get it.

Read full topic

item.description:

cooper:

I like it, the only thing I hate about it is on No Mercy Chapter 5 when you’re about to go to the helicopter and a tank comes and throws you off the roof… quite frustrating.

Not when you’re the tank, it’s so satisfying.

item.title: Left 4 Dead
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:2, topic:245098”]One thing i’m worried about though is that it only has a 2 hour story mode, nothing else - yes you can co-op through it which is the main appeal but playing on your own is just not fun at all.

So yeah, maybe i’ll get it if a few more friends get it but i won’t otherwise.[/quote]
By yourself it’s alright, but on co-op, expert mode, it’s easily 2 hours to do one chapter.
That’s probably a good call.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

One thing i’m worried about though is that it only has a 2 hour story mode, nothing else - yes you can co-op through it which is the main appeal but playing on your own is just not fun at all.

So yeah, maybe i’ll get it if a few more friends get it but i won’t otherwise.

Read full topic

If you like anything Valve has ever made, you’ll love this game.
I can’t even start on how much fun it is. It’s the perfect balance of scary and good wholesome fun.
Imo, and mo is pretty damn good ;), this deserves game of the year.
